title: Bonus Episode # 7 – "Danger on Your Doorstep" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this bonus episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark (http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/category/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/) , we bring you two terrifying tales from authors CardboardPizzas and Christopher Maxim, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry (http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/performers/otis-jiry/) , about creepy clairvoyance and paranormal pets.




Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
